DatabaseConnectionException
The 'DatabaseConnectionException' class handles the database related exceptions.
DatabaseContext
 
Employee
The 'Employee' class represents the employee entity with various attributes such as employeeId, firstName, lastName, dateOfBirth, gender, email, phoneNumber, address,positions, joiningDate and terminationDate
EmployeeController
The 'EmployeeController' class has the whole operations for the system.
EmployeeDAO
The 'EmployeeDAO' class provides the data access operations related to the employees in the database.
EmployeeNotFoundException
This class is for EmployeeNotFoundException.
EmployeeService
The 'EmployeeService' class represents the operations of the employee.
FinancialRecord
The 'FinancialRecord' class represents the financialRecord entity with various attributes such as recordId, employeeId, recordDate, descriptions, amount and recordType It helps to retrieve and set the attributes.
FinancialRecordDAO
The 'FinancialRecordDAO' class provides the data access operation related to the financialRecord in the database.
FinancialRecordException
This class is for FinancialRecordException.
FinancialRecordService
The 'FinancialRecordService' class represents the operations of the financialRecord.

The 'Payroll' class represents the payroll information of the employee.
